directions: On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the carrots, parsnips, and shallot with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Roast until the vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes. Set aside to cool.
Combine the carrots, parsnips, shallot, remaining 1/3 cup oil, the chicken broth, apple juice concentrate, vinegar, maple syrup, salt, and pepper in a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth.
ingredients: 2 medium carrots, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
2 medium parsnips, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
1/3 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil
1/4 cup frozen unsweetened apple juice concentrate, thawed
title: Roasted Root Vegetable Vinaigrette
